dont understand how to install Excessive Plus and Point Release 1.32..

someone who can help? i guide?

You don't need a key to play online - not on all servers. Just press escape, when prompted with cdkey.

Mathias' problem is a config-issue. You need to create a q3config.cfg inside the q3 base folder.
And sorry for double post, but you can use The All-seeing Eye for serverbrowsing. Just google it.

And a last one... When you've installed the game, just run the point release. It's a plain install, like the game. The excessive zip-file, is just the a folder (I guess), which you need to copy to your q3-folder. Same deal with OSP, if it isn't executable.

For the CD key, you used to be able to just enter all 2's.  Like "222222222222222222222" and it would work.  Not sure if they've fixed that since point release 1.27 though.
Works GREAT. Even able to execute from a flash drive. And for those looking cheats go to http://www.gamewinners.com/DOSWIN/blquake3arena.htm you cheaters. =P
CheeseFrog is right. If you just hold down the number 2 until it says valid key, it works fine. That's what I did and it accepted it. No need for a keygen.

Wow, I've never seen this many seeders for one download before. Cool beans.

In Vista 64 Ultimate, the autorun installer will give an error... What you need to do is open the image, be it burned or in Deamon TOolz or the likes, and run the setup.exe from the Quake3 folder... The one WILL work...

Once installed, set to run in XP SP2 mode and it's golden...

I had to look this info up as it wasn't included in any kind of setup nfo or txt in this torrent... I'm posting it for those other users that use Vista 64 in any flavour and want to run this wonderful game...
